name: Harvest Solitaire
description:
Do you like to play Solitaire games or Klondike Patience gams? Or do you love farming games?

Harvest Your Crops Right Now! It's Harvest Solitaire!-the classic, fun solitaire card game with interesting new twists.

In this Farm theme solitaire puzzle game, where the fun is:
● Challenge hundreds of challenging solitaire puzzles.
● Grow dozens of wonderful crops and unlock mysterial leves.
● Harvest corn from your farm by solving solitaire puzzles!
● Collect delicate card skins.

HIGHLIGHTS:
-Delicate graphics and comfortable farm theme.

-Hundreds of fun levels, with more in new editions.

-Powerful game props, Wild card or Smart card, which one do you prefer?

-Easy to operate and gain pleasure but not so easy to master.

Go on a harvest adventure game in Harvest Solitaire world. Download and Enjoy the most attractive Harvest Solitaire strategy card games!
